hadith.text: Narrated Ka'b ibn Malik: I said: Messenger of Allah, to make my repentance complete I should divest myself of my property as sadaqah (alms) for Allah and His Apostle. The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: Retain some of your property, for that will be better for you. So he said: I shall retain the portion I have at Khaybar
